channel.title: Having some major issues [317]
channel.description:
now before you all slate me for being a deltascape user, i actually have quite a good community setup, and the server has been going well..
however, recently the server has been "crashing" more, as in all of a sudden in the serverside cmd ill this for all players
[client-1] clienthandler: disconnected [userip] null
along those lines, and it seems to now be doing it more frequantly. at the begining servers was 24/7 up.. a few days ago even but all of a sudden without any update its started to do this..
i have had an injection of players from 50 max to 70 max..
any help please?
